Name: Alaska No.2
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
7.5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: The original recipe suggests adding the cassis separately after the drink is strained into the glass so it sinks. Looks great but the resulting drink is very sour until the cassis is stirred in.
Nutrition: One serving of Alaska No.2 contains 207 calories
